name: refocus-server
description: Local status server for Refocus Chrome extension

scripts.start:bg: nohup node server.js > refocus.log 2>&1 & echo $! > refocus.pid && echo 'Server started in background (PID: '$(cat refocus.pid)')'
scripts.stop: if [ -f refocus.pid ]; then kill $(cat refocus.pid) 2>/dev/null && rm refocus.pid && echo 'Server stopped'; else echo 'No server running'; fi
scripts.status: if [ -f refocus.pid ] && kill -0 $(cat refocus.pid) 2>/dev/null; then echo 'Server running (PID: '$(cat refocus.pid)')'; else echo 'Server not running'; fi
